meta.description: Builder provides a number of builder objects that make creating structured data simple to do[...]
meta.long_description: Builder provides a number of builder objects that make creating structured data simple to do.  Currently the following builder objects are supported:  * XML Markup * XML Events
meta.name: ruby-builder
